title: Pasta with halloumi and red onion
description: A really easy pasta recipe for when you need a satisfying dinner in a hurry.

default: 150g/5½oz penne pasta, cooked according to packet intructions
salt and freshly ground black pepper

steps: Heat the olive oil in a frying pan over a medium heat. Add the onion and the chilli flakes and fry for 2-3 minutes, until soft.
Add the halloumi and fry for 2-3 minutes, until golden.
Add the pasta, fresh herbs and lemon juice and mix together well.
To serve, place in a warm bowl and season, to taste, with salt and freshly ground black pepper.
